name.baseName: Aluminum ingot casting ; Primary aluminum ingot ; Liquid primary aluminum ; 2017
铝锭铸造 ; 原生铝锭 ; 液态原铝 ; 2016年

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: This data set pertains to the process of casting primary aluminum ingots from liquid primary aluminum, a practice commonly occurring in 2017. Primary aluminum ingot, cast in this manner, is typically used in a wide range of industrial applications, including manufacturing of transport vehicles, construction materials, packaging, and in electrical industries for conductors. It is relevant when assessing the environmental impact of products or components made predominantly from cast aluminum.
该数据集描述了2017年铸造原生铝锭的过程，该过程涉及将液态原铝转换成铝锭的常见工序。铸造而成的原生铝锭广泛应用于各种工业应用，包括交通运输车辆制造、建筑材料、包装以及电气行业的导体。在评估主要由铸铝制成的产品或组件的环境影响时，此数据具有关联性。

technology.technologicalApplicability: This data set pertains to the process of casting primary aluminum ingots from liquid primary aluminum, a practice commonly occurring in 2017. Primary aluminum ingot, cast in this manner, is typically used in a wide range of industrial applications, including manufacturing of transport vehicles, construction materials, packaging, and in electrical industries for conductors. It is relevant when assessing the environmental impact of products or components made predominantly from cast aluminum.
该数据集描述了2017年铸造原生铝锭的过程，该过程涉及将液态原铝转换成铝锭的常见工序。铸造而成的原生铝锭广泛应用于各种工业应用，包括交通运输车辆制造、建筑材料、包装以及电气行业的导体。在评估主要由铸铝制成的产品或组件的环境影响时，此数据具有关联性。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: The data in this study refers to the LCA data of PA, SA, electricity, and other background data. The PA data were obtained from statistical data sources, and the SA data were mainly obtained from the literatures. The background data were mainly derived from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018, which was established by the Research Center for Eco-Environmental Sciences, Chinese Academy of Sciences and covers LCA data for energy, materials, transportation, waste management etc.

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).
Ding, N., Liu, N., Lu, B. & Yang, J. Life cycle greenhouse gas emissions of aluminum based on regional industrial transfer in China. J. Ind. Ecol. 25, 1657–1672 (2021).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When utilizing this LCA data, users should pay careful attention to the scope of the assessed process, ensuring it corresponds with the intended application of the data in their environmental impact studies. It covers data for the year 2017 and should be used with regard to the technological practices prevalent at that time. The data should be adjusted if used for analyses in different regions or years, to reflect changes in technology and practice. Furthermore, any use of background data such as energy, materials, transportation, and waste management should consider the specific context and origin of the data, primarily from the Chinese localization LCA database CAS RCEES 2018. Data adjustment may be necessary to account for technological and methodological differences when applied to non-Chinese or more recent contexts.

使用此生命周期评估（LCA）数据时，用户应仔细关注所评估过程的范围，确保它与其环境影响研究中数据的预期应用相对应。此数据涵盖2017年的数据，并应考虑到当时流行的技术实践。如果用于不同地区或年份的分析，应调整数据以反映技术和实践的变化。此外，使用诸如能源、材料、运输和废物管理等背景数据时，应当考虑数据的具体情境和来源，主要来自中国本土化生命周期评估数据库CAS RCEES 2018。当应用于非中国或更现代的上下文时，可能需要进行数据调整，以解决技术和方法学的差异。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
